New Records: Glenn Maxwell scored the fastest World Cup century in 40 balls.
Key Match Events: Adam Zampa took 4 wickets in the match
Glenn Maxwell scored 106 runs off 40 balls
Bas de Leede conceded 115 runs in 10 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Australia won the toss and chose to bat first
Experts predicted Australia as the favorites given their home advantage
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins expressed satisfaction with the team's performance
Glenn Maxwell expressed that the 100-run partnership with Pat Cummins was crucial
Scott Edwards of Netherlands felt his team should have been better
Adam Zampa now has the most wickets in World Cup 2023 with 13 scalps
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side
The match ended with a record 309-run margin of victory
